#define DRIVERS_MAX_LIBS   32

Functions

void drivers_handle_type (char(*type_name)[], litm_bus message_bus_id, litm_bus system_bus_id)

Detailed Description

Date:
2009-05-21
Author:
Jean-Lou Dupont
Dynamically loads phidget drivers

Library Conventions:

Naming

The name of the library should follow the pattern: 
                                libpm{phidget_type_name}.so
where phidget_type_name is in lower-case.

Location

The libraries must be located in /usr/lib

Function Documentation

void drivers_handle_type ( char(*)  type_name[],
litm_bus  message_bus_id,
litm_bus  system_bus_id 
)

Handles the dynamic library associated with the phidget type

Parameters:
type_name string
message_bus_id the LITM bus_id for the general messages
system_bus_id the LITM bus_id for the system messages (eg. shutdown, timer)
This functions handles the loading (if not already) of the dynamic library associated with a given phidget type
